item.title: About
item.description:
Greeting!. My name is Adharsh. My cerebral inclinations are captivated by the boundless expanse of Free and Open Source Software (FOSS), Linux, anime, cinematic experiences, sonic expressions, and most notably, any phenomenon that pertains to computers and technology - an area that has secured a sacrosanct place in my heart. When I am not engaged in the rigors of professional pursuits, I often find myself ensconced in introspective rumination on various topics. My curiosity is piqued by the enigmatic conundrums of existence, including the ontological question of our raison d’être - a query that has captivated philosophers and scholars for centuries. These musings serve as a catalyst for me to delve deeper into the labyrinthine complexities of life’s mysteries.

Also maybe just a tiny bit of authoring logical statements in a specific programming language that convey meaning and can be interpreted by a computing device for the purpose of accomplishing predetermined objectives.

This is a website made by hugo. Source code of this website is hosted at codeberg

You can contact me by instagram , github , email
